entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
